title: What we know about the sinking of the superyacht off Sicily
RFK Jr to join hands with Donald Trump? 'As always, I am willing...'
content: ​Independent presidential candidate Robert F Kennedy Jr's running mater Nicole Shanahan Tuesday said the Kennedy campaign is considering dropping out of the race and endorse Donald Trump. The statement came as Kennedy Jr has reportedly been spurned by both the GOP and the Democrats for he wants a cabinet position in exchange for his support.
summary: ​Independent presidential candidate Robert F Kennedy Jr's running mater Nicole Shanahan Tuesday said the Kennedy campaign is considering dropping out of the race and endorse Donald Trump. The statement came as Kennedy Jr has reportedly been spurned by both the GOP and the Democrats for he wants a cabinet position in exchange for his support.

title: 'I never thought...': Former Trump official Stephanie Grisham reveals why she would speak at DNC
content: "I never thought I’d be speaking at a Democratic convention. But, after seeing firsthand who Donald Trump really is, and the threat he poses to our country, I feel very strongly about speaking out," Stephanie Grisham who was Trump's press aide during the 2016 campaign and then became an official of Trump administration said.
summary: "I never thought I’d be speaking at a Democratic convention. But, after seeing firsthand who Donald Trump really is, and the threat he poses to our country, I feel very strongly about speaking out," Stephanie Grisham who was Trump's press aide during the 2016 campaign and then became an official of Trump administration said.

title: Blinken visits Gaza mediators in pursuit of cease-fire deal as Hamas, Israel signal challenges
Megyn Kelly slammed for making fun of Black colleges: 'Did you fall on your head?'
content: "Imagine the white person up there: I'm proud to tell you I went to a mostly white university," Megyn wrote and was condemned for her 'disgusting' attack. Journalist Joan Walsh replied: "Did you fall on your head?" " What made you even dumber than your Black Santa idiocy?" Norman Orstein, contributing editor at the Atlantic, wrote: "Megyn Kelly. Racist embarrassment."
summary: "Imagine the white person up there: I'm proud to tell you I went to a mostly white university," Megyn wrote and was condemned for her 'disgusting' attack. Journalist Joan Walsh replied: "Did you fall on your head?" " What made you even dumber than your Black Santa idiocy?" Norman Orstein, contributing editor at the Atlantic, wrote: "Megyn Kelly. Racist embarrassment."

title: NYC lawyer missing in Bayesian yacht mishap off Sicily. His last social media post was...
content: ​The New York City lawyer who went missing after the Bayesian yacht sank off Sicily, in his last social media post, wrote about living happily ever after -- following a win in a case. The case linked him to British entrepreneur Mike Lynch who is also missing since the yacht mishap. Christopher Morvillo, the 59-year-old lawyer, helped Mike win his fraud trial.
summary: ​The New York City lawyer who went missing after the Bayesian yacht sank off Sicily, in his last social media post, wrote about living happily ever after -- following a win in a case. The case linked him to British entrepreneur Mike Lynch who is also missing since the yacht mishap. Christopher Morvillo, the 59-year-old lawyer, helped Mike win his fraud trial.

title: 'Awful': Biden's aide says President's DNC speech was pushed out of prime time
content: President Joe Biden was scheduled to speak at 9.50 pm Monday but his speech was delayed as Hillary Clinton, Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez apparently took more time in their warm-up speeches eventually pushing Biden's farewell speech past prime time. Reports said the delay resulted in a drop in live view of the President's speech as it was wrapped up well after midnight -- in New York.
summary: President Joe Biden was scheduled to speak at 9.50 pm Monday but his speech was delayed as Hillary Clinton, Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez apparently took more time in their warm-up speeches eventually pushing Biden's farewell speech past prime time. Reports said the delay resulted in a drop in live view of the President's speech as it was wrapped up well after midnight -- in New York.

title: 'Trump will win if ... ': Why ex-Obama strategist said this about US presidential elections
Kamala Harris' stepdaughter Ella Emhoff shows up at DNC. Republicans find her weird because...
content: Kamala Harris' stepdaughter Ella Emhoff was spotted at the Democratic National Convention Monday night in support of her momala Harris wearing a Harris-Walz campaign camouflage hat. But the Republicans did not approve of her dressing and how she posed with her father Douglas Emhoff for the camera. MAGA social media users called her 'weird', 'creepy' and her pose of side-hugging her father weirder. "She's gotta make sure her armpit hair shows," one commented.
summary: Kamala Harris' stepdaughter Ella Emhoff was spotted at the Democratic National Convention Monday night in support of her momala Harris wearing a Harris-Walz campaign camouflage hat. But the Republicans did not approve of her dressing and how she posed with her father Douglas Emhoff for the camera. MAGA social media users called her 'weird', 'creepy' and her pose of side-hugging her father weirder. "She's gotta make sure her armpit hair shows," one commented.

title: US presidential elections: Democrats bid farewell to teary Biden as he passes baton to Kamala Harris
King Charles to visit Southport to pay tribute to knife attack victims
content: Britain’s King Charles to visit Southport on Tuesday to pay tribute to the victims and families of a mass stabbing last month. The July 29 attack killed three young girls and injured several others, leading to nationwide riots and unrest fueled by online misinformation, which falsely attributed the attack to an Islamist migrant.​​
summary: Britain’s King Charles to visit Southport on Tuesday to pay tribute to the victims and families of a mass stabbing last month. The July 29 attack killed three young girls and injured several others, leading to nationwide riots and unrest fueled by online misinformation, which falsely attributed the attack to an Islamist migrant.​​

title: Alexandria Cortez blasts at Trump in a fiery speech at DNC
content: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez endorsed Kamala Harris at the Democratic National Convention, while criticising former President Donald Trump’s economic policies. She praised Harris’s dedication to the working class and highlighted the growing unity in the Democratic Party. Ocasio-Cortez contrasted Trump’s alleged prioritisation of the elite with Harris’s commitment to uplifting ordinary Americans.
summary: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez endorsed Kamala Harris at the Democratic National Convention, while criticising former President Donald Trump’s economic policies. She praised Harris’s dedication to the working class and highlighted the growing unity in the Democratic Party. Ocasio-Cortez contrasted Trump’s alleged prioritisation of the elite with Harris’s commitment to uplifting ordinary Americans.

title: Why did Queen Elizabeth II consider Donald Trump ‘very rude’, reveals book
content: A recent biography of Queen Elizabeth II by Craig Brown, unveiled the Queen's disapproval of former US President Donald Trump's behavior during his visits to the UK. She found him "very rude" and suggested he had an arrangement with his wife, Melania. The book also highlights the Queen's interactions with other controversial leaders.
summary: A recent biography of Queen Elizabeth II by Craig Brown, unveiled the Queen's disapproval of former US President Donald Trump's behavior during his visits to the UK. She found him "very rude" and suggested he had an arrangement with his wife, Melania. The book also highlights the Queen's interactions with other controversial leaders.

title: Comedian Eric Andre claims racial profiling and humiliation at Melbourne airport
content: American comedian Eric Andre reported being racially profiled and searched by sniffer dogs at Melbourne Airport. He shared his experience on Instagram and X, expressing concerns for other travellers of colour. Andre intends to consult a discrimination lawyer and has urged people of colour to be cautious when travelling through Melbourne Airport. The airport is investigating the claims.
summary: American comedian Eric Andre reported being racially profiled and searched by sniffer dogs at Melbourne Airport. He shared his experience on Instagram and X, expressing concerns for other travellers of colour. Andre intends to consult a discrimination lawyer and has urged people of colour to be cautious when travelling through Melbourne Airport. The airport is investigating the claims.

title: Taiwan conducts missile drills at sensitive test site
content: Taiwan conducted missile drills at the Jiupeng base, simulating the interception of enemy fighters and munitions, aiming to boost its 'combat effectiveness' against China. The exercises saw the firing of Sky Bow III and US-made Patriot II missiles, with all missiles hitting their targets successfully, marking a significant step in Taiwan's efforts to strengthen its defense capabilities.
summary: Taiwan conducted missile drills at the Jiupeng base, simulating the interception of enemy fighters and munitions, aiming to boost its 'combat effectiveness' against China. The exercises saw the firing of Sky Bow III and US-made Patriot II missiles, with all missiles hitting their targets successfully, marking a significant step in Taiwan's efforts to strengthen its defense capabilities.

title: Kevin O'Leary slams 'Kamalanomics' as ‘inflationary and unfeasible’
content: Kevin O'Leary criticised Kamala Harris's economic proposals on CNN, especially her plans to ban grocery price gouging and increase affordable housing. He compared these to failed socialist policies and labelled them impractical and inflationary. The Wall Street Journal echoed similar sentiments, likening Harris’s proposals to unsuccessful global price controls.
summary: Kevin O'Leary criticised Kamala Harris's economic proposals on CNN, especially her plans to ban grocery price gouging and increase affordable housing. He compared these to failed socialist policies and labelled them impractical and inflationary. The Wall Street Journal echoed similar sentiments, likening Harris’s proposals to unsuccessful global price controls.

title: What to watch as the Democratic National Convention enters its second day in Chicago
content: The Democratic National Convention continued with a focus on Vice President Kamala Harris and her running mate, Minnesota Governor Tim Walz. Former President Barack Obama and Michelle Obama supported Harris' nomination. Protests related to various social issues and the Israel-Hamas war occurred near the event. Former President Donald Trump held counter-events in battleground states.
summary: The Democratic National Convention continued with a focus on Vice President Kamala Harris and her running mate, Minnesota Governor Tim Walz. Former President Barack Obama and Michelle Obama supported Harris' nomination. Protests related to various social issues and the Israel-Hamas war occurred near the event. Former President Donald Trump held counter-events in battleground states.

title: Tropical Storm Gilma strengthens in Pacific, expected to stay offshore
content: Tropical Storm Gilma strengthened in the eastern Pacific Ocean, providing relief to coastal residents. By Monday night, no coastal warnings were issued. Positioned 720 miles southwest of Mexico's Baja California peninsula, Gilma showed potential to reach hurricane strength midweek, accompanied by sustained winds of 60 mph. Meanwhile, Hurricane Ernesto caused dangerous rip currents along the US East Coast.
summary: Tropical Storm Gilma strengthened in the eastern Pacific Ocean, providing relief to coastal residents. By Monday night, no coastal warnings were issued. Positioned 720 miles southwest of Mexico's Baja California peninsula, Gilma showed potential to reach hurricane strength midweek, accompanied by sustained winds of 60 mph. Meanwhile, Hurricane Ernesto caused dangerous rip currents along the US East Coast.

title: 'We're going nowhere': Thai opposition figure says court interventions must stop
content: Thailand's Pita Limjaroenrat, banned from politics for 10 years, called for judiciary reforms to end cycles of interventions affecting governance. Despite his popularity, the dissolution of his Move Forward Party and the dismissal of Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin highlighted ongoing political instability in Thailand, dominated by the military and powerful institutions.
summary: Thailand's Pita Limjaroenrat, banned from politics for 10 years, called for judiciary reforms to end cycles of interventions affecting governance. Despite his popularity, the dissolution of his Move Forward Party and the dismissal of Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin highlighted ongoing political instability in Thailand, dominated by the military and powerful institutions.

title: 'Bridging proposal': Blinken says Israel accepts Gaza plan, presses Hamas to agree
content: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken announced Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu's acceptance of a US "bridging proposal" to resolve disagreements for a Gaza ceasefire. Blinken urged Hamas to agree. The proposal aims to resume stalled ceasefire talks in Qatar. Despite optimism, significant challenges remain, with key issues unresolved over months of negotiation.
summary: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken announced Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu's acceptance of a US "bridging proposal" to resolve disagreements for a Gaza ceasefire. Blinken urged Hamas to agree. The proposal aims to resume stalled ceasefire talks in Qatar. Despite optimism, significant challenges remain, with key issues unresolved over months of negotiation.
